name: Critical Issues in Music and Society
description: An investigation into significant issues in music and society. Topics will vary but may encompass art, popular and world music. Issues may include musics relationship to technology, commerce and industry, identity, visual culture, and performativity. Through readings and case studies we consider music's importance to and place in society and culture.
prerequisites: VPMB82H3 and VPMB84H3 and [1.0 credit at the C-level in VPM courses]
